name: order_sequence_diagram
title: Order Processing Sequence Diagram
description: UML sequence diagram showing the order processing flow from user interaction through web UI, API gateway, and various microservices including order service, inventory, payment, and notification systems with numbered synchronous and asynchronous message flows
python_code:
from diagrams import Diagram, Cluster, Edge
from diagrams.onprem.client import Users, Client
from diagrams.generic.compute import Rack
from diagrams.generic.network import Router
from diagrams.generic.blank import Blank

graph_attr = {
    "fontsize": "24",
    "bgcolor": "white",
    "pad": "0.6",
    "splines": "ortho",
    "nodesep": "0.7",
    "ranksep": "0.9",
}

with Diagram(
    "Order Processing Sequence Diagram",
    filename="OUTPUT_PATH",
    outformat="png",
    show=False,
    direction="TB",
    graph_attr=graph_attr
):
    # Actors and Systems
    user = Users("User")
    web_ui = Client("Web UI")
    api_gateway = Router("API Gateway")
    order_service = Rack("Order Service")
    inventory = Rack("Inventory")
    payment = Rack("Payment")
    notification = Rack("Notification")
    
    # Spacers for sequence diagram layout
    spacer1 = Blank("")
    spacer2 = Blank("")
    spacer3 = Blank("")
    spacer4 = Blank("")
    
    # Message flows with numbering
    user >> Edge(label="1. Place Order", color="blue", style="bold") >> web_ui
    web_ui >> Edge(label="2. Submit Order Request", color="blue", style="bold") >> api_gateway
    api_gateway >> Edge(label="3. Create Order", color="blue", style="bold") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="4. Check Stock", color="blue", style="bold") >> inventory
    inventory >> Edge(label="5. Stock Available", color="green", style="dashed") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="6. Process Payment", color="blue", style="bold") >> payment
    payment >> Edge(label="7. Payment Success", color="green", style="dashed") >> order_service
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="8. Send Notification
(Async)", color="orange", style="dashed") >> notification
    
    order_service >> Edge(label="9. Order Confirmed", color="green", style="dashed") >> api_gateway
    api_gateway >> Edge(label="10. Order Response", color="green", style="dashed") >> web_ui
    web_ui >> Edge(label="11. Display Confirmation", color="green", style="dashed") >> user
    
    notification >> Edge(label="12. Email/SMS Sent
(Async)", color="orange", style="dotted") >> spacer1
